strings.BadNum: Invalid number.  The number must contain only digits (no more than %1% before the decimal point and no more than %2% after).
strings.BadIntWithRange: Invalid integer number. Cannot be less than %1%, or greater than %2%.
strings.BlankDate: Blank is an invalid date. Defaulting to today's date.
strings.BlankTime: Blank is an invalid time! Defaulting to current time!
strings.BadBool:
Invalid value.
Value must be "true" or "false"
strings.BadDBCS_TooLong: Converted length of characters entered is %1 which exceeds the maximum allowable length of %2.
strings.BadDBCS_SBCSNotAllowed: Only DBCS characters are allowed in this field. %1 SBCS characters have been entered.
strings.BadDBCS_DBCSNotAllowed: Only SBCS characters are allowed in this field. %1 DBCS characters have been entered.
strings.BadDBCS_BothNotAllowed: Either all DBCS characters or all SBCS characters are allowed in this field. %1 SBCS characters have been entered. %2 DBCS characters have been entered.
strings.NoXMLHttpRequest: XMLHttpRequest not supported by this browser.
